items.title: Gaming’s most fun sales data is full of old and obscure games
items.summary: Every month, Circana video game analyst Mat Piscatella posts fascinating data about video game sales on Bluesky, highlighting trends like November's historically bad month for game hardware and Battlefield 6's big launch in October. But he doesn't just share data about what is selling the most; as â€¦

items.summary: A customer who ordered an MSI Suprim RTX 5090 worth at least $3,000 was scammed out of their money when they received a box filled with rocks instead. The story shared on Reddit highlights another entrant in the long line of GPU scam-swap cases, but this time it was an Amazon Resale item, where youâ€¦

items.title: iQOO 15 Ultra confirmed to feature shoulder triggers with 600Hz sampling rate and haptic feedback
items.summary: The iQOO 15 Ultra will launch in China next month, and images iQOO shared recently revealed its design and color options. These images also showed the iQOO 15 Ultra's right frame with touch-sensitive shoulder triggers, which we now know will have haptic feedback. This revelation comes through a Weiâ€¦

items.title: GB's Brookes and Atkin claim X Games golds
items.summary: Great Britain's Zoe Atkin claims her second X Games freeski title and Mia Brookes wins gold in the women's snowboard slopestyle competition in Aspen, Colorado.

items.title: vivo V70 Elite's specs and design surface
items.summary: vivo is set to unveil the X200T in India on January 27, and, if rumors are to be believed, the brand will introduce the V70 and V70 Elite there next month. items.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang laments selling some of his stock in the company to buy a Mercedes Benz S-Class for his parents in 1999. They are said to still have the vehicle in their possession, although they also regret the gift.
